name: Dauphine Organics - NatCera™ Advanced Ceramide Complex
description: Dauphine Organics offers NatCera™ Advanced Ceramide Complex (V), a plant-based, skin-identical vegan formulation that restores and strengthens the natural barrier. This vegan ceramide complex provides complete barrier support while meeting natural and vegan cosmetic requirements.
products.name: Dauphine Organics - NatCera Advanced Ceramide Complex
products.description: Dauphine Organics is a natural and vegan cosmetic ingredients supplier offering NatCera Advanced Ceramide Complex (V), a plant-based, skin-identical ceramide complex that restores and strengthens natural barrier. Their vegan formulation is ideal for natural and vegan cosmetics focusing on barrier repair applications.
products: NatCera Advanced Ceramide Complex (V) - Vegan, plant-based, skin-identical
products.notes: NatCera™ branded ingredient emphasizes natural and vegan credentials. Plant-based, skin-identical formulation meets growing demand for vegan cosmetics. Advanced complex provides complete barrier support without animal-derived ingredients.
notes: Natural and vegan cosmetic ingredients supplier from Canada. NatCera Advanced Ceramide Complex (V) is a plant-based, skin-identical ceramide complex that restores and strengthens natural barrier. Vegan formulation appeals to natural and clean beauty cosmetics market. Ideal for brands seeking plant-based barrier repair solutions without animal-derived ingredients.
